definition: quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])

sentences.english: Several rum runners were arrested in the train.
sentences.chinese: 幾個私酒販子在火車上被捕了。

sentences.english: FOX caught in a trap escaped, but in so doing lost his tail.
sentences.chinese: 一隻狐狸被捕獸器把尾巴夾斷了。

sentences.english: Mr Yettaw, who has been ill since his arrest in Burma, wore the mask to guard against infection.
sentences.chinese: 他在緬甸被捕以後，染病戴着口罩是爲了防止感染。

sentences.english: Rosa Parks, was arrested for not giving a white bus rider her seat, Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 帕克斯夫人是由於未給一名白人乘車者讓座而被捕。

sentences.english: Texas, with a stolen car and was sent to Gateville State School for Boys …
sentences.chinese: 我終於因偷竊汽車，在德克薩斯州的漢都被捕。

sentences.english: As I see it, we can't even afford to have him arrested or accused.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，要是他被捕或受到起訴，那咱就受不了。

sentences.english: The swordfish got entangled in the fishing net.
sentences.chinese: 箭魚被捕魚網給捲入了。

sentences.english: When she was arrested at Notre Dame last month, he was right beside her.
sentences.chinese: 當她上個月在聖母大學被捕後，特里一直陪伴着她。

sentences.english: Colombian officials were arrested quickly. Then Amador made a speech.
sentences.chinese: 哥倫比亞在巴拿馬的官員很快就被捕了。

sentences.english: He himself showed up at the cells in Newgate to take depositions from the men he caught.
sentences.chinese: 他自己發現這些細胞在紐蓋特到從他被捕的男子供詞。

sentences.english: I also hadn't planned on getting caught, but caught I was.
sentences.chinese: 我也沒有計劃被捕，但沒躲過去。

sentences.english: A central New York man hit the criminal justice trifecta , three arrests in three hours.
sentences.chinese: 紐約一男子在三小時內創下接連被捕三次的記錄。

sentences.english: There have even been high-ranking government officials arrested for taking bribes from drug traffickers.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有高級政府官員因涉嫌收受毒販賄賂而被捕。

sentences.english: Too many of the deer had been killed and they disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 大量的麋鹿被捕殺，並滅跡了。

sentences.english: Why was Chigurh being arrested at the beginning of the film?
sentences.chinese: 殺手在電影開始的時候爲什麼被捕？

definition: to go to jail/to be sent to prison
on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to commit a crime or offence
lit. to get shackled and thrown in jail (idiom)/fig. to be put behind bars/to get jailed
